function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Perception of COVID-19 as a severe and enduring health risk","Impact":"Increased anxiety and worry about personal and public health","Mitigation":"Education on public health measures, access to mental health support, and effective communication of risk reduction strategies","Technologies":"Telemedicine for mental health support, public health apps for education and communication","People":"General public, individuals with pre-existing mental health conditions","Owner":"Public health organizations, mental health professionals, government agencies"},{"Description":"High anxiety levels due to COVID-19","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health and well-being","Mitigation":"Access to mental health services, support networks, mindfulness and stress-reduction techniques","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health apps, online support communities","People":"General public, individuals with pre-existing mental health conditions","Owner":"Mental health professionals, support organizations, community leaders"}]}
